jd: From: Teja, TalentGroups teja.t@talentgroups.com Reply to: teja.t@talentgroups.com Hi,I'm Teja from Talent Groups.I hope you're doing well!Please review the requirements below, inform us of your interest, and send us your updated resume.Job Title: Oracle PL/SQL Developer Location: Pittsburgh, PA - Onsite Contract Job description:Minimum 10 to 12 years’ Experience in product development Having good IT experience as an ORACLE PL/SQL Developer, involved in Requirement Gathering, analysis, Design, Development, Unit Testing, Production Deployment and Support.At least 4 years of experience in SQL and PL/SQL programming, developing complex code units.Solid Experience of creating PL/SQL Packages, Procedures, Functions, Triggers, Types, Views in Oracle.Knowledge of manufacturing processes. Knowledge on Steel/Aluminum industry process would be preferred.knowledge of ISA 95.knowledge of integration between MES , L2, ERP systems.Understanding and Collecting requirements from Business user side or Business Analyst and try to convert that requirement to PL SQL.Responsible for performance tuning activities in the project.
